oracle.spatial.spark.vector.index.quadtree

Class QuadTreeConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.spark.vector.index.quadtree.QuadTreeConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, SpatialPartitioningConfiguration

    public class QuadTreeConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpatialPartitioningConfiguration
    Configuration used by QuadTreeDistIndex and QuadTreePartitioning. Partitioning quality and speed can be affected by setting configuration properties.
    Author:
    hsaucedo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setRddSize

        public void setRddSize(long rddSize)
        Sets the size of the RDD to be partitioned/indexed. Setting this value can speed up the partitioning process and generate more accurate partition size.
        Parameters:
        rddSize -

      • setRecordSize

        public void setRecordSize(long recordSize)
        Sets the average record size
        Parameters:
        recordSize -

      • setSamplingFraction

        public void setSamplingFraction(java.lang.Double samplingFraction)
        Sets the sampling fraction used for sampling the RDD for calculating partitions. When this property is set, the RDD will always be sampled for calculating partitions. When this property has not been set, the RDD may be sampled or not, depending on the RDD size and the executor memory.
        Parameters:
        samplingFraction -

      • setTolerance
